instructions: Open the Activity app on your iPhone. Tap a date in the calendar to see a breakdown for that day.
Open the Activity app on your iPhone. Tap Trends at the bottom of the screen.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone, then tap My Watch. Tap Activity, then configure the reminders.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone, then tap My Watch. Tap Activity, then turn off Daily Coaching.

Open the Mail app, go to the inbox, and tap a read message to open it. Messages that have been opened or read do not have a blue indicator next to them. Go to the message toolbar and tap the Flag button. The toolbar is at the bottom of the iPhone and at the top of the iPad Mail app. Select Mark as Unread .

Go to the Mailbox inbox or folder that contains the messages you want to mark as unread. Tap Edit to display an empty circular button next to each email. Tap each circular button in front of the read messages those without the blue unread indicator that you want to mark as unread. A white check mark appears in the circular button. Tap Mark . Select Mark as Unread to mark the selected emails as unread.
